text: The Abilene Eagles were a West Texas League minor league baseball team. They were based in Abilene, Texas, USA from 1920 to 1922,.Abilene BR page They won the league championship in both 1920 and 1921. The team managers for those years were Bugs Young and Ed Kizziar (1920) and Grady White and Hub Northen (1921). They finished in sixth place in 1922. The league folded following the 1922 season, and the Eagles followed suit.Baseball Reference Minors Future major league baseball player Fred Johnson played for the Eagles. ==References== Category:Sports in Texas Category:Abilene, Texas Category:1920 establishments in the United States Category:1920s establishments in Texas Category:1922 disestablishments Category:1920s disestablishments in the United States Category:Disestablishments in Texas Category:Baseball teams in the United States
title: Abilene Eagles
